## NumberListDefinition type

Provides information about whether/how to present a list of allowed number field values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type NumberListDefinition = ListDefinition & {
    Entries?: Array<number>;
};
```

**References:** [ListDefinition](./open-api-client.listdefinition.md)
